translations.15: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺

words.translation: And you see|the people|entering|into|(the) religion|(of) Allah|(in) multitudes

translations.1: Wa-ra-aitan naasa yadkhuloona fee deenil laahi afwajaa
translations.15: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds

words.translation: Then glorify|(the) praises|(of) your Lord|and ask His forgiveness|Indeed He|is|Oft-Returning

translations.1: Fasabbih bihamdi rabbika wastaghfirh, innahoo kaana tawwaaba
translations.15: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance
